Information for the Scientific Community

Analysed data
Phylogenetic analysis of H5N1: Nextstrain

Raw data
Genetic Sequence information from various sources: https://gisaid.org/
Genetic sequence information from he National Veterinary Services Laboratories (NVSL) of the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service (APHIS) of the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA): https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA1102327
Wastewater surveillance data: https://data.wastewaterscan.org/

Tools and methods
Consensus genomes: https://github.com/andersen-lab/avian-influenza
